name: iOS 14.5 and iPadOS 14.5
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to access notes from the lock screen
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker in a privileged network position may be able to alter network traffic
advisories.description: A certificate validation issue was addressed.

advisories.available: iPhone 8 and later, iPad Pro (3rd generation) and later, and iPad Air (3rd generation) and later
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Zuozhi Fan (@pattern_F_) and Wish Wu (吴潍浠) of Ant Group Tianqiong Security Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: An issue in code signature validation was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to create or modify privileged files

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An application may be able to read restricted memory
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to place phone calls to any phone number
